posts.title: How To Display Current Year in Website Footer
posts.body: 1. First, place a placeholder span element where you want to display the current year in your HTML: 2. Next, use the following JavaScript code to get the current year and display it in the placeholder document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { var currentYear = new Date().getFullYear(); document.getElementById('currentYear').textContent = currentYear; });
